動物用藥品名稱: 維克犬兒健犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、腺病毒第二型、小病毒、副流行性感冒活毒、鉤端螺旋體不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 臺灣維克法蘭斯股份有限公司
地址: 1 ERE AVENUE, 2065 M L.I.D., 06516 CARROS, FRANCE
效能(適應症): 預防犬瘟熱、傳染性肝炎、犬小病毒感染症、鉤端螺旋體、副流行性感冒。
ingredients: CANINE DISTEMPER VIRUS (LIVE)(Lederle strain) AT LEAST 10^3 TCID50CANINE CONTAGIOUS HEPATITIS VIRUS (LIVE)...    AT LEAST 300 TCID50(MANHATTAN STRAIN)CANINE PARVOVIRUS (LIVE) (CPV 780916 strain)  AT LEAST 10^5 TCID50CANINE PARAINFLUENZA VIRUS (LIVE)..........AT LEAST 10^5 TCID50(MANHATTAN STRAIN) LEPTOSPIRA INTERROGANS CANICOLA (INACTIVATED).........AT LEAST 800 X 10^6 BACTERIALEPTOSPIRA INTERROGANS ICTEROHAEMORRHAGIAE (INACTIVATED)....AT LEAST 800 X 10^6 BACTERIA
